competitors_analyzed.key_strengths: DR 66 with massive backlink profile. Clear market authority.
22+ brands with comprehensive reviews. Tabbed interface (Top 10 vs New Sites). Sport-specific sections (Football, Horse Racing, GAA). Payment methods comparison. Strong filtering and navigation.
Domain authority with .ie extension signals local focus.
Highest DR (73) in top 5. Strong brand recognition. International affiliate with Ireland-specific section.
